### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #21575 (refactor: Create blockstorage module by MarcoFalke)
* #21467 (Move external signer out of wallet module by Sjors)

Light Concept NACK.\n\nI prefer the Speedy Trial activation method which you have started on in a different [PR](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21377). I also think (I could be wrong) a flag day activation stands much less chance of being merged given harding's [F7 argument](https://lists.linuxfoundation.org/pipermail/bitcoin-dev/2021-February/018415.html) and Rusty's "Developers should
